data.why:
Various modules,

    Traceroute and Ping in pureperl which require no extra non standard
    modules.

    Curses text scrolling

    livingston portmaster hidden protocol

    data piping

    bandwidth benchmarking

    decode/encode PPP packets

    And now that my company will allow me to contribute, without owning
    everything I write, I'll be happy to do whatever is needed.
